Karanga Te Ataahaea Marsh shares journey with CBD oil in Tolaga Bay https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/27/karanga-te-ataahaea-marsh-shares-journey-with-cbd-oil-in-tolaga-bay/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/27/karanga-te-ataahaea-marsh-shares-journey-with-cbd-oil-in-tolaga-bay/ Matai O'Connor, Kaupapa Māori reporterCBD the answer to his anxiety and depression from having drug-resistant epilepsy. Fri, 26 Jul 2024 17:01:00 +0000 Karanga Te Ataahaea Marsh is a medicinal cannabis patient who has accessed it through Rua Bioscience's compassionate access programme for the last two years. He says it has changed his life.
Rocks scaling work on SH2 south tonight https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/27/rocks-scaling-work-on-sh2-south-tonight/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/27/rocks-scaling-work-on-sh2-south-tonight/ Contractors will carry out rock scaling work in Waikare Gorge on SH2 south again tonight. Fri, 26 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 A major slip came down on a section of State Highway 2 south through the Waikare Gorge this week and NZTA contractors are carrying out overnight rock scaling work to remove any further loose debris and boulders.
